name: Frozen Harvest
description:
Frozen Harvest is a first person adventure game

You are the first settler and one of many recruits for the interplanetary farming initiative lead by the Global Agricultural Organization, or GAO. Your goal is to settle and create a large-scale farm to grow and supply Earth’s ever-growing population of humans with food and other supplies made much rarer due to the lack of farm space Earth has. Initial arrival has run smoothly and your home and basic farming resources arrived on the new planet, with your animals to be arriving in around a week or so once setup has passed regulatory inspection. Among your initial supplies is a weather adjustment device (WAD), which is primarily used to terraform portions of the planet on a small scale in case predictions on climate are slightly amiss. You wake to find the WAD malfunctioning, causing a huge snowstorm threatening to bury you in an endless blizzard. Your goal is to search around your newly created farmstead to find replacement parts to fix the WAD and bring your area back to a nice warm climate.
